data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Miranda, Venezuela a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Miranda, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Miranda who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Miranda to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Miranda.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, Dutch people.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 325,262 believers in Miranda, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Miranda, Venezuela.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary:
the state of Miranda, Venezuela has a population of 2,675,200.

We estimate Miranda has 325,262 people who might know Jesus, 1,884,654 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 465,284 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Miranda hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
